ShaderNodePreset.Description:
This Matchbox shader simulates a CRT monitor with scanlines, noise, and chromatic aberration.
Setup:
- scanlineRange: Adjust the width of the scanlines. - noiseQuality: Control the vertical noise granularity. Lower = more visible lines. - noiseIntensity: Control horizontal noise/jitter. - offsetIntensity: Control the strength of scanline offset. - colorOffsetIntensity: Control chromatic aberration strength. - iTime : Controls time.
For support contact @ johndaro.com
Based on a Shadertoy shader. Matchbox version by [John Daro 02122024]
